message.body: Hey! sorry i didnt respond, busy...i think my piece came out weird, kiln deff didnt get hot enuf but w.e. also anna wanted her tree trunk little piece in the low fire kiln today. its on her shelf and it has tree roots hanging down. all u have to do is flip it upside down to fire it and it balances. do u want me to come in after 4pm and help?
i probably won't be in until 5,you can come if you like but it's whatevs.
Okay, ill let u knw. i may have 2 work late 2day, thanks!
hey, i loaded all the bisque stuff and anna's piece didn't really have a good place to be. i might do it later during break.
aka there's no need for you to come down. thanks though!
Okay kewl :) ya i wanna load a piece later during break too. do u think ull do one next weekend?
for sure. just let me know when your stuff is done and i'll do it then.
